text: is a Japanese politician and the current governor of Yamaguchi Prefecture in Japan. He was first elected in 2014,Ex-bureaucrat wins Yamaguchi race, The Japan Times, February 24, 2014. and re-elected in 2018. == References == Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:People from Yamaguchi Prefecture Category:University of Tokyo alumni Category:Governors of Yamaguchi Prefecture
title: Tsugumasa Muraoka
